Twelve weightie queries of great concernment shewing in what cases the difference of mens judgements, and opinions in matters of religion, is not to be restrained but tolerated by the civill power.
[2], 10 p.
Printed by Matthew Simmons, for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop ..., London : 1646.
"Published according to order." Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
